description:
** Update with improve stability and ability to display even more currencies on main screen** 
Thanks for such positive feedback !!

Add sharing features.


Best Currency converter available on WebOS. Optimized for Palm Pre and Palm Pixi with almost 200 currencies from all over the globe, updated instantly. 
Whether you trade currency and need accurate rate or you plan to travel in a foreign country, iConvert currency converter will be your ideal companion.  Key features include :
-	Support real time multiple currencies conversion
-	Intant conversion when you key-in
-	Almost 200 currencies, from 5 continents,  including past european currencies
-	Gold, Silver, Palladium and Platinuim commodities included
-	Easy search by currency code, county name or alphabetical order
-       Manage you favorites currencies for easy references…
